Classes/ImageTransform.html#/s:FC12Files.abstract: Flips/mirrors the image horizontally.

Classes/ImageTransform.html#/s:FC12Files.abstract: Watermarks the image by overlaying another image on top of your main image.

Classes/ImageTransform.html#/s:FC12Files.abstract: Crops selected faces contained inside an image.

Classes/ImageTransform.html#/s:FC12Files.abstract: Crops all the faces contained inside an image.

Classes/ImageTransform.html#/s:FC12Files.abstract: Pixelates selected faces contained inside an image.

Classes/ImageTransform.html#/s:FC12Files.abstract: Removes any metadata embedded in an image.

Classes/ImageTransform.html#/s:FC12Files.abstract: Includes detailed information about the transformation request.
